Uses of Class
jparsec.math.LinearFit

  • Packages that use LinearFit 
    Package Description
    jparsec.graph
    Creates charts using JFreeChart, SGT, VISAD, SurfacePlotter, and JMathPlot.

      Returns the linear fit instance for the fitting formula.
